feed.title: Cartwright Junction (Trans-Labrador Hwy) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Cartwright Junction (Trans-Labrador Hwy)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:44 a.m. ADT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 2.7Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cartwright Airport 2:00 PM ADT Saturday 1 April 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 2.7°C
Pressure: 100.8 kPa
Visibility: 16 km
Humidity: 60 %
Dewpoint: -4.3°C
Wind: WSW 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this afternoon. High plus 5. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Periods of snow beginning near midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northeast 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NDT Saturday 1 April 2023
